attributes.action: Start Spending Money on Fixing Crumbling, Unsafe Roads and Fixing Pot Holes.
attributes.background: All around the country the state of road surfaces are truly shocking. It is time for the Government to take action and start spending money on resurfacing roads which are unsafe. Roads are crumbling away, road markings are faded and pot holes are everywhere and have not been dealt with for years.

rejection.details:
The Government has increased roads funding for councils, including for fixing potholes. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-allocates-12-billion-roads-funding-to-councils

If you'd like the Government to take further action, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
